page.title: 13CLUBS, LYNEMOUTH.
page.content: {Inns and Social Clubs. cont'd. consist of billiards and snooker, bingo,bar,dance hall, rooms for public and private functions. The local Brass Band practices in these premises. During the Miners Strike l984 the Institute acted as a Meals Centre for Miners and their families. Outside the Institute building there is a Memorial to those who died during the two World Wars. The Lynemouth Working Mens Social Club provides a meeting place for residents of the area. There is a bar and facilities for dancing, concerts and bingo. The Ellington Institute has a small membership but provides similar facilities to that of Lynemouth Social Club.
